attributes.action: To suspend council tax for atleast 3 months due to current UK Pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Due to the current uncertainty of the economy - to which government made recent announcement
attributes.background: To suspend / defer council tax payments until the economy regains itself.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
